snippet.title: Styx: Blades of Greed | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Styx: Blades of Greed now on Steam ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3290690

Master the art of stealth in Styx: Blades of Greed, the long-awaited third installment in the cult-classic series! Play as Styx, the cunning goblin thief, and lead your own crew in a high-stakes hunt for Quartz, a powerful resource at the heart of a looming war.

Outsmart the Inquisition with deadly skills.
Explore three vast, vertical open environments set in a dark fantasy universe.
Craft weapons and potions to execute the perfect heist.

Whether you're a longtime fan or new to the shadows, it's never been so thrilling to be greedy! 

Styx: Blades of Greed will be available on PC, PlayStation®5 and Xbox Series X|S in Fall 2025.

Steam ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3290690
Playstation ► https://store.playstation.com/product/EP6665-PPSA28835_00-STYX300000000000
Xbox ► https://www.microsoft.com/p/buy/9NZTKVTDZ2LB
-------------------------------
